name: Color Drop Battle
description:
Drag your finger, tap, swipe down, and match rows to score points! Test your skillz and compete against friends and players from all around the world! Compete for free with virtual currency or play for REAL CASH PRIZES! Climb the Leagues for prizes, and collect medals! Will YOU get the top score?

Color Drop is powered by Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing!


**Cash Enabled Tournaments only available in the Eligible Countries & States/Provinces.

Skillz: eSports for Everyone
